name: Monument Builders - Statue of Liberty (Free)
description:
** Please note that MB: Statue is optimized for iOS 6 and later, and therefore will not work properly on iPad 1 devices**

**The smash PC series is now on iPhone and iPad! Play 10 levels FREE**

Construct the world's most famous statue for all to see in Monument Builders - Statue of Liberty, a magnificent new building challenge! Time and resource management fans will love these challenging games!

Game Features:
*Build the Statue of Liberty in this colorful time management challenge
*Travel through 19th century New York as you lead the construction of 50 levels (full version)
*Manage workers, transport materials and improve roads
*Get rid of crooks, secure against thieves, and trade with merchants
*10 levels free and 40 additional levels when you purchase the full version!

Play today!

More apps from GameHouse:
-Delicious - Emily's Wonder Wedding HD
-Delicious - Emily's True Love
-Delicious - Emily's Childhood Memories
-Sally's Salon HD
-GameHouse Casino Plus
-Collapse! Blast
